properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Once and for all, Once and for all You offered up your life For one and all, For one and all The perfect sacrifice Atoning blood was shed Love conquered when You said{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It is finished, it is done To the world Salvation comes Hallelujah, we’re alive! Hell was conquered when you cried: It is finished! It is finished!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who is this King, who is this King So mighty and so strong He is the One, He is the One The earth has waited for God’s remedy for sin With mercy for all men{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It is finished, it is done To the world Salvation comes Hallelujah, we’re alive! Hell was conquered when you cried: It is finished! It is finished!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The earth shook and trembled The sun bowed it’s head The veil of the temple was open for men As Jesus went down in the cold of the grave Defeated the darkness when He overcame{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The keys of the Kingdom were placed into hands Of children and priests and of fishers of men Through all generations His voice will be heard Creation resounds the victorious words!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It is finished, it is done To the world Salvation comes Hallelujah, we’re alive! Hell was conquered when You cried: It is finished, it is done{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now complete, the work of Love Hallelujah, He’s alive! Join the song of the ransomed Bride It is finished It is finished It is finished!{/lang-eng}
